Authors: Suroso J.S., Januanto A., Retnowardhani A.
Title: Risk Management of Debtor Information System at Bank XYZ Using OCTAVE Allegro Method
Source title: Proceedings of the International Conference on Electrical Engineering and Informatics
Affiliations: BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Suroso, J.S., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Januanto, A., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia; Retnowardhani, A., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Risk assessment as part of the risk management of the debtor information system is conducted to assess how possible threats and vulnerabilities to the debtor's information system and assets. This study aims to analyze risk on the debtor information system at Bank XYZ, while the evaluation and analysis process is more focused on the management of critical assets owned by the bank. The analysis was carried out using the OCTAVE Allegro (Operationally Critical Threat, Assets and Vulnerability Evaluation) method. It is expected that this analysis will get the final results in the form of recommendations about the steps that must be taken to protect and manage the debtor information system critical assets at Bank XYZ. © 2019 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Information systems; Information use; Risk assessment; Risk management; Critical asset; Evaluation and analysis; Threats and vulnerabilities; Vulnerability evaluations; Information management
